languages.text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда псайкер наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} целям на расстоянии 6 или более клеток, цели получают на {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} урона больше.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Psyker uses an attacking psychic power at targets that are 6 cells or farther from the Psyker, the targets suffer an additional +<u>Psyker's BS bonus</u> damage.
Whenever the psyker uses a damaging psychic power on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +<u>psyker's BS bonus</u> damage.

Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever the psyker uses a damaging psychic power on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} damage.

Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: 每当灵能者对相距至少6格的目标使用伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，该目标都会额外受到{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者对相距至少6格的目标使用伤害性灵能能力时，该目标都会受到额外伤害，等同于<u>灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
每当灵能者对相距至少6格的目标使用伤害性灵能能力时，该目标都会受到额外伤害，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el psíquico usa un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} ofensivo contra objetivos a 6 casillas o más de distancia, sus objetivos sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el psíquico usa un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} ofensivo contra objetivos a 6 casillas o más de distancia, sus objetivos sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Cada vez que el psíquico usa un poder psíquico ofensivo contra objetivos a 6 casillas o más de distancia, sus objetivos sufren +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} de daño adicional.

languages.text: 異能者が自分から6セル以上離れたターゲットにダメージを与える{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うときはいつでも、ターゲットに +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}追加ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 異能者が自分から6セル以上離れたターゲットにダメージを与える{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}を使うときはいつでも、ターゲットに +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}追加ダメージ{/g}を与える。
異能者が自分から6セル以上離れたターゲットにダメージを与える超能力を使うときはいつでも、ターゲットに +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}の追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Когда псайкер наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} целям на расстоянии 6 или более клеток, цели получают на {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} урона больше.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда псайкер наносит урон с помощью психосилы целям на расстоянии 6 или более клеток, цели получают на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g} псайкера</u> урона больше.

Когда псайкер наносит урон с помощью психосилы целям на расстоянии 6 или более клеток, цели получают на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g} псайкера</u> урона больше.
Когда псайкер наносит урон с помощью психосилы целям на расстоянии 6 или более клеток, цели получают на {unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} урона больше.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Psioniker eine schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} auf Ziele anwendet, die 6 Felder oder weiter vom Psioniker entfernt sind, erleiden die Ziele zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Psioniker eine schädigende {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} auf Ziele anwendet, die 6 Felder oder weiter vom Psioniker entfernt sind, erleiden die Ziele zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.

Wann immer der Psioniker eine schädigende psionische Kraft auf Ziele anwendet, die 6 Felder oder weiter vom Psioniker entfernt sind, erleiden die Ziele zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} Schaden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le psyker utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} qui inflige des dégâts sur des cibles situées à au moins 6 cases de lui, celles-ci subissent +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le psyker utilise un pouvoir psychique qui inflige des dégâts sur des cibles situées à au moins 6 cases de lui, celles-ci subissent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} du psyker</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires.

Chaque fois que le psyker utilise un pouvoir psychique qui inflige des dégâts sur des cibles situées à au moins 6 cases de lui, celles-ci subissent +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires.

languages.text: Ruhsezer, kendisinden 6 veya daha fazla hücre uzaklıkta bulunan hedefler üzerinde hasar veren bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullandığında hedefler +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker uses a damaging {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} on targets that are 6 cells or farther from the psyker, the targets suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
